name: R15 M
description: Yamaha Motor India has launched the new Yamaha R15 V4 and the R15M. Both these motorcycles are available at our showroom.

name: GSX-R
description: he legendary GSX-R 150 Dual ABS (Fi) Ready to reign. It is the most powerful, hardest-accelerating, cleanest-running GSX-R Dual ABS ever built.

name: CBR Repsol
description: These bikes come with special Repsol graphics and were originally offered as a tribute to the factory Honda MotoGP team.

name: MT-15
description: The bike has good ergonomics but it has a bad seat. The engine is in a beginner segment but the bike is not for beginners.

name: GSX-S
description: The Suzuki GSX-S is a standard motorcycle from the Japanese manufacturer Suzuki that was launched in 2015.

name: RTR 4v
description: The 4V engine gets a unique TVS-patented oil-cooled combustion chamber for the oil to aid in better and more effective cooling of the engine.

name: R15 V3
description: The Yamaha R15 V3 is an entry-level fully-faired motorcycle from the Japanese two-wheeler manufacturer in India.

name: Pulsar Ns
description: The Bajaj Pulsar NS, previously known as Bajaj Pulsar NS is a sports bike made by Indian motorcycle manufacturer Bajaj Auto.

name: Gixxer
description: The Suzuki Gixxer is a 154.9 cc naked motorcycle from Suzuki. Its design is similar to the GSX-S1000.

name: FZ-S
description: Yamaha FZ S FI is a street fighter bike. Good price and mileage, very nice style and comfortable for family and race bike 2 in 1
